text: Here are the standings after another dramatic weekend in the #BPL... http://t.co/iSYglRPShs
WATCH Find out what @ThierryHenry & @asmir1 have in common on Day 1 of our #BPL Advent Calendar: http://t.co/y3xnC1x3nQ
In-form Burnley striker @IngsDanny revels in his self-funded disability project: http://t.co/gpa7vFkcP6 http://t.co/u2M6bQy0LO
.@SouthamptonFC boss @RonaldKoeman has lost just one of seven meetings with Arsene Wenger (W2 D4) #ARSSOU http://t.co/knIbl0jROH
WATCH Shortly before #BPL Matchweek 14 gets under way, take in all the action from the same match-ups last season: http://t.co/xpzVnUeAqw
TEAM NEWS @SwansOfficial bring in Richards and Britton in place of Rangel and Shelvey; @QPRFC recall Dunne at the expense of Isla #SWAQPR
GOAL Burnley 1-0 Newcastle (34 mins). George Boyd smashes into the net from 20 yards after Danny Ings' knockdown #BURNEW
ASSIST Stewart Downing sent in the corner for Tomkins to head West Ham in front against West Brom just before half-time #WBAWHU
GOAL Swansea 2-0 QPR (83 mins) Routledge places into the bottom corner from the edge of the box after being teed up by Dyer #SWAQPR
"It wasn't very pretty at times but we got the job done" - Allardyce on @whufc_official's win at West Brom #WBAWHU http://t.co/zgGBnhFKxw
Burnley 1-1 Newcastle. Boyd's sweet strike helps @BurnleyOfficial climb out of the bottom 3: http://t.co/U7OIRIrFE1 http://t.co/34Nc9Wo8ju
Swansea 2-0 QPR: Ki Sung-yueng got his second #BPL goal this term - he scored the first of the 2014/15 season #SWAQPR http://t.co/a8NY38dqGN
.@Everton have scored 2 or more in 14 of their last 16 #BPL home matches. #EVEHUL preview: http://t.co/oJlC57qiCi http://t.co/nG0nHT5Ogk
TEAM NEWS Coates makes a 1st #BPL start for @SunderlandAFC, Buckley also in; Boyata & Demichelis replace Kompany & Mangala for @MCFC #SUNMCI
GOAL Chelsea 2-0 Spurs (22 mins) Oscar tees up Drogba to finish from inside the box after a poor clearance from Lloris #CHETOT
GOAL Sunderland 1-3 Man City (55 mins) Zabaleta bursts into the box to collect Nasri's clever pass and chip over Pantilimon  #SUNMCI
FULL-TIME Arsenal 1-0 Southampton. Alexis Sanchez scores late to give the Gunners all 3 points #ARSSOU http://t.co/xov6yx1jtR
"We have to manage the game better when we are leading" - @RomeluLukaku9 after Everton 1-1 Hull #EVEHUL http://t.co/kAcyCUYmfs
TABLE @chelseafc still lead by 6pts over @MCFC. Chelsea travel to Newcastle next, City host Everton http://t.co/6LbvdJYY7I
#OnThisDay in 2005, Andrew Cole lifted @MCFC to a resounding away win. More: http://t.co/e7SprtOFAH http://t.co/e9dFamBkCL
Which @LFC player gave a "masterclass" in the win over Leicester? @adrianjclarke explains: http://t.co/x5icc3tV41 http://t.co/Qb3YDJLrZp
.@chazaustin9 is in the hunt for the Barclays Golden Boot but @aguerosergiokun leads the way with 14 goals for @MCFC http://t.co/2UdZ8f3Tjx

#FootballRemembers To get involved in A Moment in History (1/2):
 1 - Organise a football match
 2 - Assemble for a pre-match photo
.@Everton's full-backs are a real  threat to @MCFC on Saturday says @pablo_zabaleta. Preview: http://t.co/eWawIZ5rvq http://t.co/EpQ90BxgSt
"All the teams want to beat us but we come here with a lot of motivation and ambition" - @chelseafc's Loic Remy ahead of #NEWCHE
GOAL Newcastle 1-0 Chelsea (57 mins). Shortly after coming on, @CissePapiss pokes home from close range to give the hosts the lead #NEWCHE
Is @NUFC's win over Chelsea the shock of the season so far? Vote here: http://t.co/5vCtFIZrwN http://t.co/P8tqdwuJFO
PENALTY to West Brom... #WBAHUL
SECOND HALF Our five 1500 GMT kick-offs are back under way... #BPL
FULL-TIME Spurs 0-0 Palace. An entertaining match with 30 goal attempts finishes goalless at White Hart Lane #TOTCRY http://t.co/1qNgWjShxY
.@MCFC boss Manuel Pellegrini: "We're not thinking about what Chelsea are doing - just thinking of beating Everton." http://t.co/qIVdDPfqBA
.@Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger: "It's difficult to understand why we gave ourselves such a mountain to climb" #STKARS http://t.co/00ztzNSs0R
Manuel Pellegrini: "Aguero has a problem in his [knee] ligament. We'll see tomorrow but I don't think it's good news" http://t.co/X6Rsqc08Jw
WATCH @LFC boss Brendan Rodgers: "The clean sheet was important; 2 in 3 games and 7 points out of 9 this week." http://t.co/D6GfsHZRRe
QPR 2-0 Burnley:  @chazaustin9 scores and is sent off in an eventful match. Full report: http://t.co/RwXSu5D5FR http://t.co/HvUabwcFfT
WATCH Take a look at what the managers are saying ahead of Sunday's action: http://t.co/kD5aJvWQKe
PHOTO Alex Song and Wilfried Bony battle for the ball early on. It's West Ham 0-0 Swansea (12 mins) #WHUSWA http://t.co/gZBpodpgf6
GOAL West Ham 2-1 Swansea (66 mins). Stewart Downing crosses and Leon Britton can't keep out Andy Carroll's header #WHUSWA
.@GarryMonk16: "We weren't at the level we have been. I think it's the first time this season I can say that" #WHUSWA http://t.co/RgmDRKQIBB
SECOND HALF Nugent replaces Ulloa for @OfficialFOXES as the action gets back under way at Villa Park #AVLLEI http://t.co/d9QR4egxhf
Villa's Alan Hutton: "It's always hard to go behind and I think that shows the character. it's a massive win" #AVLLEI http://t.co/ayZIiP5S17
